titles.title: Aleut Confinement and Relocation Sites Study Act

A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a special resource study to determine the suitability and feasibility of adding the sites associated with the forced relocation and confinement of the Aleut people during World War II in the State of Alaska as a unit of the National Park System, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
